overview:
Hamid Saify is an Afghan-American entrepreneur living in Los Angeles, CA.

Hamid’s background is in online marketing with roles as Director of E-Commerce, VP of Internet Operations, and Search Marketing Director for companies like HTC, PlayStation, fresh&easy, CiCi’s Pizza, Diamond Foods, 3 Day Blinds, Jewelry Exchange, Benchmark Brands, Databazaar, the Merrick Group, and others.

In his past, Hamid developed two e-commerce businesses with successful exits. The first was Paradigm Gallery (www.pgmod.com), a modern retailer now located in Florida. The second being Enjoy Your Sleep (www.enjoyyoursleep.com), a online mattress retailer specializing in memory foam mattresses.

Currently, Hamid and co-founder are working on ChoicePunch (www.choicepunch.com). ChoicePunch focuses on streamlining and improving the decision making process for simple and high consideration decisions.
